FabricInvalidPartitionKeyException FabricInvalidPartitionKeyException Class

In this Article

Edit

Fabric exception that indicates failure due to the use of a partition key that is not valid.

Syntax

Declaration

[Serializable]
public class FabricInvalidPartitionKeyException : FabricException, ISerializable, _Exception<Serializable>
